review_data.title: Nice pizza but location is unappetizing
review_data.content: It’s located right by the road and tram tracks, so mainly they are doing delivery I guess. But we ate inside, having a table overlooking some cars and trams :) But food is nice, pizza was freshly made, nothing bad about it, people were friendly...More

review_data.title: Beste Pizza
